reviewText: i have the same problem with the other review.  It cannot be played in my Blu-Ray player despite product described as Region A1 which should play in North America.

Marvelous!!! This guy is one of the best singers in the world ever and I really didn't know he could sing live and manage the stage and such a big crowd with such carisma and talent. One the best purchases I have made so far ever that will enjoy for many years to come. I wish I can speak italian, so I will be able to sing-along all his songs with him, but I'm inspired to learn the language based on his carreer and his fellow-italian talented singer Laura Pausini, even when I have heard all their songs in spanish. Love, Love, Love TZN!!!
for some reason i Cant play this blue ray in my machine.. quite disapointing..
